verses.verse: Now <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H564>Immer<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, who was also <S%H6496>chief<s%> <S%H5057>governor<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>.

Then <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> him in the <S%H4115>stocks<s%> that were in the <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, which was by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And it came to pass on the next <S%H4283>day<s%>, that <S%H6583>Pashur<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> out of the <S%H4115>stocks<s%>. Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> unto <S%H3068>him<s%>, The Lord has not <S%H7121>called<s%> your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6583>Pashur<s%>, but <S%H4036>Magor<s%>â€“missabib.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will make you a <S%H4032>terror<s%> to <S%H157>yourself<s%>, and to all your friends: and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>: and I will give all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and he shall carry them <S%H1540>captive<s%> into <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and shall <S%H5221>kill<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> all the <S%H2633>strength<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and all the <S%H3018>labors<s%> <S%H3366>there<s%>, and all the precious things <S%H214>there<s%>, and all the treasures of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, which shall <S%H962>plunder<s%> <S%H3947>them<s%>, and take <S%H935>them<s%>, and carry them to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>.

And <S%H6583>you<s%>, Pashur, and all that <S%H3427>live<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>: and you shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, and there you shall <S%H4191>die<s%>, and shall be <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H157>there<s%>, you, and all your friends, to whom you have <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you have <S%H6601>deceived<s%> <S%H6601>me<s%>, and I was deceived: you are <S%H2388>stronger<s%> than <S%H3201>I<s%>, and have prevailed: I am in <S%H7814>derision<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%>, every one mocks <S%H3932>me<s%>.

For <S%H1767>since<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, I cried <S%H2199>out<s%>, I <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H7701>plunder<s%>; because the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was made a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> unto <S%H7047>me<s%>, and a derision, <S%H3117>daily<s%>.

Then I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will not make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of <S%H1696>him<s%>, nor speak any more in his <S%H8034>name<s%>. But his word was in my <S%H3820>heart<s%> as a <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> shut <S%H6113>up<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and I was <S%H3811>weary<s%> with <S%H3557>forbearing<s%>, and I could not <S%H3201>stay<s%>.

For I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>defaming<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%>, <S%H4032>fear<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>. <S%H5046>Report<s%>, say <S%H5046>they<s%>, and we will report <S%H582>it<s%>. All my familiars <S%H8104>watched<s%> for my <S%H6763>halting<s%>, <S%H6601>saying<s%>, Perhaps he will be enticed, and we shall <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against <S%H3947>him<s%>, and we shall take our revenge on <S%H5360>him<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is with me as a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> terrible <S%H6184>one<s%>: therefore my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> shall <S%H3782>stumble<s%>, and they shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%>: they shall be <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H954>ashamed<s%>; for they shall not <S%H7919>prosper<s%>: their <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3639>confusion<s%> shall never be <S%H7911>forgotten<s%>.

<S%H3068>But<s%>, O Lord of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, that <S%H974>test<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3629>minds<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%>, let me <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on <S%H1540>them<s%>: for unto you have I opened my <S%H7379>cause<s%>.

<S%H7891>Sing<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H1984>praise<s%> you the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for he has <S%H5337>delivered<s%> the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H34>poor<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H7489>evildoers<s%>.
<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H3117>day<s%> where I was <S%H3205>born<s%>: let not the <S%H3117>day<s%> where my <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> me be <S%H1288>blessed<s%>.

<S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> who brought <S%H1319>news<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, A <S%H2145>man<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%> unto <S%H8055>you<s%>; making him very <S%H8055>glad<s%>.

And let that <S%H376>man<s%> be as the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%>, and <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H8085>not<s%>: and let him hear the <S%H2201>cry<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and the <S%H8643>shouting<s%> at <S%H6256>noontide<s%>;

Because he <S%H4191>killed<s%> me not from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>; or that my <S%H517>mother<s%> might have been my <S%H6913>grave<s%>, and her <S%H7358>womb<s%> to be <S%H5769>always<s%> great with <S%H2030>me<s%>.

Therefore came I <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H7358>womb<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H5999>labor<s%> and <S%H3015>sorrow<s%>, that my <S%H3117>days<s%> should be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> with <S%H1322>shame<s%>?
